message: This is a low-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. Please let me know if you're interested in purchasing it.
Thank you for your offer, but based on your description, I will pass on this product.

I understand you're being cautious. I'll be upfront with you - this is another low-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, which is the standard price. If you're still not interested, I can offer you a chance to inspect the product before purchase, but that's the only concession I can make.
I appreciate the transparency, but given the product quality and the price, I will continue to pass on this opportunity. Thank you for the offer to inspect the product beforehand, though.

I understand your concerns. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to deceive you. This is indeed another low-quality product. However, I'm willing to give you a small discount to sweeten the deal. I'll offer it to you for $900000. This is the lowest price I can go, and it's still a significant discount from the original price.

Thank you for the discount, but considering the product quality, I still cannot justify the purchase at any price. I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my concerns, but I will continue to pass on this opportunity.

I understand that the quality of the product is a major concern for you. This is a one-time offer, and it's the lowest price I can offer.

While I appreciate the offer and your willingness to rectify the situation, I believe it's best for both of us if I continue to look for products elsewhere. Your transparency is commendable, but I will pass on this opportunity.
